Mar 10

Machine Learning Top 10 Articles for the Past Month

Between January and February 2017, we’ve ranked nearly 2,000 Machine Learning articles to pick the Top 10 stories (0.5% chance) that can help advance your career.

“Machine Learning is what enabled Libratus AI to play poker against itself trillions of hands before defeating the professional players “— Noam Brown, PhD at Carnegie Mellon University

Topics included in this Machine Learning list are: NLP, Voice Recognition, Video Game AI, Tensorflow, Scikit-Learn, Translation, Neural Networks, Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning and Artificial Intelligence.

Mybridge AI ranks articles based on the quality of content measured by our machine and a variety of human factors including engagement and popularity. This is a competitive list and you’ll find the experience and techniques shared by the leading data scientists particularly useful.

Rank 1

Neural networks and deep learning (free ebook) — Michael Nielsen, Research at Y Combinator

Rank 2
